code:
stateDiagram-v2
    state "Play: loop and when" as play_1 {
        state task_1_when <<choice>>
        note right of task_1_when
            when
             - flag > 0
        end note
        state "show values<hr>action: debug" as task_1
    }
    [*] --> task_1_when
    task_1_when --> task_1
    task_1 --> [*]
    task_1_when --> [*] : skip
    task_1 --> task_1_when : loop\n - foo\n - bar
repo_description: Create a PlantUML/Mermaid.js State Diagram from Ansible-Playbook
